topics.body:
Hmmm.... I thought of something; I talked about it a while back in the unpopular opinion thread, but personally I think the world would be better with a benevolent philosopher king was in control of the majority of the world (basically imagine a second Alexander the Great) and thinking on things Alexander the Great really was the greatest leader of all time and theoretically if he never thought with his dick then chances are the events that eventually led to the overextension militaristically and in turn in the long run the fall of Rome would have never happened; if Rome never fell then fast forward to early 1900 if Rome was still all powerful then the events that led to WWI would have never happened; if WWI never happened then the Depression would have never happened; if the Depression and WWI never happened then WWII would have never happened; if WWII never happened then the red scare, the great leap forward and the ussr's regime would have never happened.

Interesting how one person not being able to keep his dick in his pants managed to change the course of history.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
